posts.post_content:
Sorry if this is in the wrong section, but I had to put this somewhere

7 Cobb T206's found in paper bag:

[url]http://www.nbcnews.com/news/us-news/seven-rare-ty-cobb-baseball-cards-found-crumpled-paper-bag-n530726[/url]

and

[url]http://www.cbc.ca/news/world/ty-cobb-baseball-card-1.3473803[/url]
wow, all 7 have the "TY COBB" back.

Thanks for trying to help. You can always PM me for board questions. This is a great thread on the front page now. Much appreciated and happy collecting.
